amendatorysection.catchline: Sealing of records; notice to juvenile; contents.
amendatorysection.para: For a juvenile described in section 43-2,108.01, the county attorney or city attorney shall, in addition to the filings or actions described in such section, provide the juvenile with written notice that:

(1) States in plain language that the juvenile may petition the court to seal the record when the juvenile has satisfactorily completed the diversion, mediation, probation, supervision, or other treatment or rehabilitation program provided to the juvenile under the Nebraska Juvenile Code or has satisfactorily completed the diversion or sentence ordered by a county court; and
(2) Explains in plain language what sealing the record means.
